title: Bug 19651: Team menu disappears from Hierarchy and Packages view
description: The Team menu is missing from the Hierarchy and Packages view. It was present in step 9 of the process. Note: TestClass.java is not in any CVS repository, but the issue was first observed with a file managed by CVS.
EB:
11) Select the word InnerClass in the text editor and press F4. The popup menu on the new hierarchy view does not show the Team menu. This is expected since it is an inner class. 
12) Select the word TestClass in the new text editor and press F4. The Team menu is not displayed, but it should be, as it is not an inner class.
14) After following the above steps, there should be three opened windows.
